data.meta_description: With the iPublishCentral Reader App you can read ebooks and content in PDF and EPUB format on your iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch. You can organize books in to shâ¦
data.text:
With the iPublishCentral Reader App you can read ebooks and content in PDF and EPUB format on your iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch. You can organize books in to shelves, customize your reading experience, add notes or highlights to specific passages, bookmark a page, and download content from your Dropbox account and e-mails. Your last read page, notes, highlights, and bookmarks are synchronized across devices when network connectivity is available. This synchronizations enables you to pick a book from where you left off on another device.

Download ebooks:

Â· From various ebookstores hosted on the iPublishCentral platform

Â· Non-DRM PDF and EPUB content from your e-mails, and Dropbox

Customize your reading experience:

Â· Add notes or highlights to specific passages, bookmark pages/locations

Â· Select among four typefaces and adjust font size, set margins

Â· Set background color of the Reader

Â· Switch between horizontal swipe and vertical scroll

Â· Set brightness level

Organize:

Â· Organize your ebooks/content by creating shelves

Navigation:

Â· Search for specific keywords and navigate to a specific passage by picking a search result

Â· Swipe or scroll to go to previous or next page

Â· Use the page slider to quickly navigate across

Â· Go to specific passages from the table listing the personalizations

Â· Table of contents

Formats supported:

Â· Ebooks in PDF format hosted on the iPublishCentral platform

Â· Ebooks in EPUB2 and EPUB3 format hosted on the iPublishCentral platform

Â· Interactive ebooks and audio (read aloud) ebooks hosted on the iPublishCentral platform

Â· Non-DRM PDFs

Â· Non-DRM EPUBs

Hope you enjoy reading your ebooks on the iPublishCentral Reader App

iPublishCentral Team
